attributes.title: ruined my life
attributes.review: This app destroyed my health. I was perfectly healthy before I was born last month until my mother downloaded this terrible app. It was so toxic it lead to several congenital defects. I was born with glass bones and paper skin. Every morning I break my legs and every night I break my arms. At night, I lie awake in agony until my heart attacks put me to sleep. And president tr*mp claims to be pro life😔.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE CURSED
attributes.review: Once I opened this app I immediately felt kicking in my stomach I CAN NOT be pregnant so I took a test and I was!😡 I didn’t know who the dad was I just gave up! But then the weirdest thing happend! Donald Trump came to my house and said the baby was his! Keep in mind I am only 1 years old! I bowed down to Donald as he walked in! After that he ripped the baby out of my stomach and ATE IT!!🤬DO NOT GET THIS APP OR THIS WILL HAPPEN!!

TRUMP2020🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷on a gravestone🙈🦋🧚I downloaded this app and looked at the reviews👁👄👁I immediately knew those gen z kids were ruining everything😪so I still proceeded to download the app🙊And the first thing I saw was a 🍊🧚crusty,musty, sun tanned, easy baked,Cheeto puff lookin excuse for a president🧚🍊and immediately after downloading I had a heart attack and died 😵🤕I cant believed it turned out like this😪DONT DOWNLOAD🙅‍♀️
#blm#ACAB#dumptrump

attributes.title: This app is crap
attributes.review: I have been a super trump fan my whole life, but this app changed that! 🧚🏼🧚🏼 After mr. orange man told me to download this app, of course i did! ❤️🧚🏼✨✨ But it shut my whole phone down. Ugh i can’t believe my loyal and faithful president would put this god forsaken app in to the world where i could hurt the lives of his innocent supporters. And yes this review is totally unbiased! ✨✨✨🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼

attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED!
attributes.review: I was just hoping to be able to support by absolutely wondrous ✨✨and devoted president 🇺🇸but instead its confusing and misleading! 🤬🤬The app? Slow. The only people you can follow? Donals Trump and his teams, which i would usually mind but I want Melania on there too! 😱😱😱Disgusting the obvious troll this app is. I would expect more from Trump’s Campain but they betray him yet again. 😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: martha😁was🥰an🙃average🐕dog. She went💨aërf🍒&🤕ærph😪&👻EEEER🤖

attributes.title: A Broken Heart
attributes.review: I was sooooooo excited to find that trump got an app! This excitement turned to true despair after I downloaded it. As soon as the download completed, my entire phone started to glitch. Soon, instant combustion! His app must have put some kind of virus (similar to corona) in my phone and it completely destroyed it. Donald J Trump, you will be hearing from my lawyers.

attributes.title: a snowflake run app don’t fall 4 it !!
attributes.review: As a die hard maga supporter I knew this was the app for me, however there is far too many technical glitches it froze my phone for 2 hours, I had to restart my entire phone. There is too much liberal propaganda on this app, it’s all just fake news, fellow maga supporters do not fall for this hoax by the dems!!!

attributes.title: a squirrel could design a better app
attributes.review: the app is horrible. besides having a bad color scheme and a really ugly dude as the background when you open the app, the layout is super confusing and i can’t navigate it at all. you also have to enter your email to see anything which is a COMPLETE invasion of privacy.

attributes.title: Skip the fake news
attributes.review: All the info straight from the source.  No fake news spin.
